hackathon-description-text: Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies have taken the world by storm! Starting from a near zero valuation of $0.06 on July 2010, we’ve seen Bitcoin (The most well-known Crypto) rise to an all-time high of over $20,000 in July 2017 to the current price of about $8,000. Due to this price volatility, Bitcoin, Cryptocurrencies, and Tokens are often the focal point of Blockchain technologies and the Blockchain industry. While Cryptocurrencies may dominate the conversation, it is the often-overlooked Decentralized Ledger which should be the true focus of Blockchain. In this case we will challenge you to examine the business and technical opportunities of Decentralized Ledgers to uncover the true powerhouse behind the Blockchain industry. More specifically, this case will focus on MultiParty Aggregation of Decentralized Ledgers to explore the opportunities in shared data and databases.
